text: The men's K-1 5000 metres competition at the 2018 ICF Canoe Sprint World Championships in Montemor-o-Velho took place at the Centro de Alto Rendimento de Montemor-o-Velho. ==Schedule== The schedule was as follows: {| class="wikitable" ! Date ! Time ! Round |- | style=background:lemonchiffon| Sunday 26 August 2018 ||style=background:lemonchiffon| 16:50 ||style=background:lemonchiffon| Final |} All times are Western European Summer Time (UTC+1)
